quotes.quote: It is not certain when the first settlement was made or who established it. The Guatemalan authority, Francisco Asturias, is inclined to give credit [for first Hon settlement] to Peter Wallace, an English buccaneer and Sir Walter Raleigh's first lieutenant, and to place the foundation in 1603.
quotes.quote_n: Quote content from Asturias aa p 12 / It is not certain when the first settlement was made or who established it. /v Curry p 32

quotes.quote: Major Sir John Burdon, a recent governor of the colony, suggested that a Scot corsair chief, Wallace (or Willis), ex-governor of Tortuga, settled there in 1638.
quotes.quote_n: Quote content from Burdon 1 p [missg] or Asturias aa pp 13-17 / It is not certain when the first settlement was made or who established it. /v Curry p 32
quotes.date: in 1638 / after period as governor of Tortuga
